issue.title: [C++] Unary kernels can leave uninitialized data under null entries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13041](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13041). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In `ScalarUnaryNotNullStateful`, not all null value visitors are careful to initialize the underlying data deterministically.
